name: part_013
file: tmp_【3D Live】Let My Voice Enchant You Tonight! #3DKobornDay2025 [jNCGOv8Zz1A]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Kobo performing the song 'Finale.' on stage with a rainbow and starry background.
MC section where Kobo talks to the audience, thanks them, and signs off.

subtitles.original: エンドより 甘くて豪華な
subtitles.english: Sweeter and more luxurious than the end roll,

subtitles.original: デザートより
subtitles.english: More than dessert,

subtitles.original: 君がいいんだよ
subtitles.english: I prefer you.

subtitles.original: 二つの傘より
subtitles.english: Rather than two umbrellas,

subtitles.original: 相合い傘
subtitles.english: sharing one together.

subtitles.original: ちょっと冷たいけど
subtitles.english: It's a little cold, but...

subtitles.original: 愛するための代償なら
subtitles.english: If it's the price to pay for love,

subtitles.original: いくらでもどうぞ
subtitles.english: then take as much as you want.

subtitles.original: ただずっとそばにいたい
subtitles.english: I just want to stay by your side forever.

subtitles.original: ねえ 誰を？星屑もんない
subtitles.english: Hey, who? Stardust is boring.

subtitles.original: 二人ぼっちの世界でずっと
subtitles.english: In a world of just us two, forever.

subtitles.original: 最後の花火を上げて
subtitles.english: Launch the final fireworks,

subtitles.original: フィナーレを飾って
subtitles.english: decorate the finale,

subtitles.original: 奇跡の降る恋に落ちて
subtitles.english: and fall in a love where miracles rain down.

subtitles.original: 誰も離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let anyone go.

subtitles.original: 味気ない世界も悪くないね
subtitles.english: This dull world isn't so bad, is it?

subtitles.original: どんなに恋をしたって
subtitles.english: No matter how much I love,

subtitles.original: 出会えないよ きっと
subtitles.english: I surely won't find another like this.

subtitles.original: 終わりのない幸せにキスをしよう
subtitles.english: Let's kiss this never-ending happiness.

subtitles.original: いつか今日を忘れても
subtitles.english: Even if I forget today someday,

subtitles.original: 君がいいんだよ
subtitles.english: it still has to be you.

subtitles.original: 天気雨の日 言い訳として
subtitles.english: Using the sun shower as an excuse,

subtitles.original: 初めて目が合った
subtitles.english: our eyes met for the first time.

subtitles.original: ずっと覚えておくよ
subtitles.english: I will remember it forever.

subtitles.original: ねえ 誰を？星屑もんない
subtitles.english: Hey, who? Stardust is boring.

subtitles.original: 二人ぼっちの世界でずっと
subtitles.english: In a world of just us two, forever.

subtitles.original: 最後の花火を上げて
subtitles.english: Launch the final fireworks,

subtitles.original: フィナーレを飾って
subtitles.english: decorate the finale,

subtitles.original: 奇跡の降る恋に落ちて
subtitles.english: and fall in a love where miracles rain down.

subtitles.original: 誰も離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let anyone go.

subtitles.original: 味気ない世界も悪くないね
subtitles.english: This dull world isn't so bad, is it?

subtitles.original: どんなに恋をしたって
subtitles.english: No matter how much I love,

subtitles.original: 忘れられないよ きっと
subtitles.english: I surely won't be able to forget.

subtitles.original: 終わりのない幸せにキスをしよう
subtitles.english: Let's kiss this never-ending happiness.

subtitles.original: 味気ないね
subtitles.english: It's dull, isn't it?

subtitles.original: でもそれがね
subtitles.english: But that is,

subtitles.original: 二人の幸せ
subtitles.english: our happiness together.

subtitles.original: Oh my god, I almost cried.
subtitles.english: Oh my god, I almost cried.

subtitles.original: I was crying in this song.
subtitles.english: I was crying in this song.

subtitles.original: Thank you for today guys.
subtitles.english: Thank you for today guys.

subtitles.original: Thank you for watching until the end.
subtitles.english: Thank you for watching until the end.

subtitles.original: And thank you for Zeta-chan because she covered this Finale song first...
subtitles.english: And thank you for Zeta-chan because she covered this Finale song first...

subtitles.original: ...and then I was inspired so yeah,
subtitles.english: ...and then I was inspired so yeah,

subtitles.original: aku nyanyi di sini.
subtitles.english: I sang it here.

subtitles.original: いやいや、今日は来てくれて...
subtitles.english: No, no, thank you for coming today...

subtitles.original: 今日は来てくれて、最後まで見てくれてありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming today, and thank you for watching until the very end.

subtitles.original: I hope you guys enjoy all the performance.
subtitles.english: I hope you guys enjoy all the performance.

subtitles.original: Umm, yeah. This whole stream.
subtitles.english: Umm, yeah. This whole stream.

subtitles.original: みんな大好き！
subtitles.english: I love you all!

subtitles.original: Thank you for your birthday wishes.
subtitles.english: Thank you for your birthday wishes.

subtitles.original: あとで読んであげますね。
subtitles.english: I'll read them for you later, okay?

subtitles.original: Bye bye minna! No more encore, no more encore. Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Bye bye everyone! No more encore, no more encore. Bye bye!

subtitles.original: Bokobokobo Kobo Kanaeru at your service.
subtitles.english: Bokobokobo Kobo Kanaeru at your service.

subtitles.original: Let me be your sun to shine your day.
subtitles.english: Let me be your sun to shine your day.

subtitles.original: Ehehe. Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Ehehe. Bye bye!
